name: Chodaks Fate
description:
Estimated play time for current build: 20 minutes

Chodaks Fate is an action RPG based on finding secrets and overcoming strange new experiences that will keep you guessing.

The narrative (However minimal at this time) is told between the lines of actual dialogue, do your best to interpret it in your own way.

The current build may not accurately represent the final product, but the concept is set.

Popo says the coast is clear, so head on in. Remember to use your ARROW KEYS! :)

As far as the future of this game goes, there are a few definite things planned but I also love to get the community involved, so all suggestion either in the comments or emailed to me will be carefully considered.

This game is in very early beta, and may include bugs. You can email any feedback to connorw19@hotmail.com for now.
